original_text: I also trust God like these men do. Like them, I believe that people will become alive again after death. God will do this for all people, both good people and bad people.
korean_text: 그들이 기다리는 바 하나님께 향한 소망을 나도 가졌으니 곧 의인과 악인의 부활이 있으리라 함이니이다

sentences.original_text: I also trust God like these men do.
Like them, I believe that people will become alive again
sentences.korean_translation: 그들처럼, 나는 사람들이 다시 살아날 것이라고 믿습니다.

sentences.original_text: God will do this for all people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 모든 사람들을 위해 이것을 행하실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: both good people and bad people.
